item.title: Trump wants to revamp the Fed. Here’s what that could mean for you.
item.description: President Donald Trump’s efforts to revamp the Federal Reserve could have far-reaching consequences for the U.S. economy and everyday Americans.

item.title: Trump calls for expansion of death penalty in D.C.
item.description: The president calls for seeking the death penalty in all D.C. murder cases, a step that would face intense pushback, both legally and politically.
